songs.title: Keep Firin’
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]

[Verse 1: ILL Bill]

But Tell-lie-vision owns the youth
We keep firing!

[Hook]

[Verse 2: Madd Joker]

Black and white cruisers
Bullets with tips made of hollow

[Hook]

[Verse 3: ???]

[Hook]

[Outro: Everlast]
Once again, back in the house, Mr. Everlast
AKA Fidel Astro, AKA The Mighty Whitey Ford
AKA Mr. fucking White is in the fucking building
A brand you can motherfucking trust!
songs.album: ILL Bill Is The Future Vol. II
